name: It's Okay
description:
_________________________________________________________________________

It's Okay is a simple game in which you have to match the Arrow Keys that appear on your screen...

or...don't.

This isn't a game per say. 

This is an experience in which I hope you'll realize you don't have to do everything life throws at you or you throw at yourself.
It's Okay to say no sometimes. Life happens even when you take a break and that's fine.

It really is fine.

_________________________________________________________________________

_________________________________________________________________________
